pages.title: Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre

internal.text:
Cold Waves
Cold wave prediction over India (WRF Model)

Cyclone
Sat. Based Cyclone Obser. and Realtime Pred. over IO.

Heat Waves
Heat Wave Prediction over India (WRF Model)

Heavy Rain
Heavy Rain (>5mm/hr) forecast using NWP model.

Sea State
Sea State forecast in terms of Wave Height, Wave period etc.

Solar & Wind
3 Days Solar and Wind Forecast for every 15 minutes

Cloud Burst
Cloud Burst Nowcast for 6 hours over Western Himalayan region.

Heavy Rain
Satellite based nowcast for Heavy rain events for 6 hours.

AWS Time Series
AWS Time Series

MOSDAC LIVE
Let's Interactively Visualise the Earth (LIVE)

Indian State Portal
Alerts for Indian States

South East Asian Countries
Alerts for South East Asian Countries

OIL SPILL
ALTIMETER LCS-CORES AND STRETCHING DIRECTIONS

Ocean Subsurface Fields
Ocean Subsurface Fields

Safe Beach
RIP Current Forecast for All-India beaches.

images.desc: Secondary menu SignUp Login Logout Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre Space Applications Centre, ISRO

Solar & Wind 3 Days Solar and Wind Forecast for every 15 minutes
Cloud Burst Cloud Burst Nowcast for 6 hours over Western Himalayan region.
Heavy Rain Satellite based nowcast for Heavy rain events for 6 hours.
AWS Time Series AWS Time Series

pages.title: MOSDAC Live

metadata.title: MOSDAC Live
metadata.description: MOSDAC-LIVE is a web enabled data and Information visualization and analysis system of MOSDAC, SAC/ISRO. Provides access to Satellite Data Products and Information products derived from Satellite and model forecast in near real time basis.
metadata.keywords: Forecast, Nowcast, Current Events, Near Real time,  Cloud cover, Surface winds, Fire, Heavy rain, RIP current, Snow, Cloud Burst, Heat Wave, Cold Wave, INSAT-3D, INSAT-3DR, Kalpana-1, SCATSAT-1
